availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary Ann Marcus (Grant County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to John Mason Marcus in Scott County, Kentucky on October 21, 1860. Mother of Emeline Marcus, Martha Marcus, and Alice Marcus.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Cordova, p. 487A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, Film #000183225, p. 305 of microfilm (accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Mary Ann Marquis (Sept 8, 1836-Oct 23, 1893)," Memorial #50554427, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/50554427 (accessed September 4, 2020).
